OUR SERVICES

We're offering a full range of services for almost any construction related company.

web development

is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet.

  • Content management systens
  • Virtual shops and ecommerce
  • Presentation websites
  • Online catalogues
  • Portal systems
  • & any other dynamic website

graphic design

is the process of visual communication and problem-solving using one or more of typography, photography and illustration

  • Logo design
  • Flyers & Brochures
  • Business Cards
  • Stationery Design
  • Powerpoint presentation
  • Print Ads / Magazine
  • Banners

internet marketing

is the marketing of products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the Internet, display advertising.

  • Search engine optimisation
  • Search engine marketing
  • Internet advertising
  • Web analysis
  • Blog marketing
